successStories.title: Student Achievements
successStories.subtitle: Our students have achieved remarkable success in academics, research, and university admissions.

kaist.text: Thanks to the mentoring, I completed my first research paper and won a KSEF award. The guidance was invaluable.
kaist.author: Student, KAIST Admit

berkeley.text: The YAHAIT tutoring helped me achieve a perfect 5 score and inspired me to pursue computer science in college.
berkeley.author: Student, UC Berkeley Admit

georgia.text: My mentor helped me develop a strong portfolio that stood out in my university applications. I got into my dream school!
georgia.author: Student, Georgia Tech Admit
